Paragraph: But Lebanese political analysts have said that would be out of the question and Lebanese authorities pre-empted the issue by taking legal action against Lahd .

2. The second entity is "Lebanese authorities." Here, "authorities" refers to the government or those in power in Lebanon, so "Lebanese authorities" can be considered an organization entity.
